short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your Watch2Gether rooms right from the New Tab page of your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Watch2Gether Launcher replaces the new tab page of your browser with a beautiful dashboard listing your Watch2Gether rooms and their activity. There is also a search bar on the new tab page.

This is an additional extension that can be used alongside Watch2Gether's main browser extension. 

If you don't like the new tab experience you can simply uninstall the launcher and the original new tab behavior of your browser is restored.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Watch2Gether - Launcher extension and setting New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 

Privacy policy: https://w2g.tv/pages/privacy_en
Terms of Use: https://community.w2g.tv/t/terms-of-use-english/597

About Watch2Gether:

With Watch2Gether you can watch videos together. Create a room, share the link and you're good to go. All videos run synchronously and you can talk via the built-in chat. Have fun with Watch2Gether!
